detailedDescription: With the support of several co-workers, I eagerly took part in our Fastify version upgrade 2.15.x to 3.x.x and the refactoring effort for our new docs.microsoft.com rendering service.

Migrated our frontend for docs.microsoft.com analytics/telemetry library from a soon to be deprecated library to the 1DS Web Analytics library. Refactored it to be more modular and allowed for easier analytics library switching and for running multiple libraries in parallel.
Collaborated with designers and worked on parts of our new docs.microsoft.com profile redesign.
Worked on our internal Angular Pattern Library and Documentation.
Worked on our internal React Pattern Library and Documentation.
Built out an end to end modular chatbot application with my lead developer using Amazon Lex, Live Person, and our own Natural Language Processor (NLP).
Took ownership and worked on Angular Product Release 2.0 Redesign for Most Valuable Possessions.
Built a React.js drag and drop interface for the Integrated Voice Recognition Team to improve the efficiency of building voice prototypes.
Increased the performance and load-time by 70% Improving and optimizing the architecture of the MileWise web-app.
Anonymously nominated to receive the department wide “Be The Leader Award” both March 2019 and April 2019.
Worked closely with designers to develop clean and concise user experiences and interfaces.
Expanded on the current Sec3ure Healthcare platform in Polymer.js
Independently re-wrote 40% of their application in the first 2 weeks I joined using Vue.js, completed Angular 5, React.js prototypes of the application.
In spare time built out scripts and small applications to improve the workflow of other people in different departments.
Co-Wrote entire Consultant Enrollment Platform in two weeks using Vue.js.
Designed the User Experience and User Interface for both Japanese and Canadian markets
Co-developed front-end with my senior front-end developer for two major web applications in five months for their Japanese and Canadian markets using Vue.js.
Independently built the base prototype for the company’s first mobile app.

detailedDescription: Developed interactive learning software for elementary school children using Angular 1.x.
Developed interactive learning software for K-5 audience in collaboration with the Curriculum team and UX/UI team.
Collaborated with small team to maintain and improve company’s e-commerce website.
Spearheaded “sandboxing” of new e-commerce website and web application, collaborating closely with UX/UI Designer to develop e-commerce experience.
Boosted website traffic by 60% using SEO efficiently and effectively managing social media accounts.
Developed and automated their entire marketing campaigns.
Created a private platform for real-estate agents to access for help.
Created web applications in JavaScript, Angular and React
Deployed four live heavy web applications using Angular 1.4, React.js
Reversed engineered twitter embedded feed for websites and created a personalized one for company contractor reviews
